body.p:
Phon includes 3 different queries types available from the window menu under Query:
The Data Tiers query will query any tier as well as include aligned data to the target query
The Phones query will look for a query the IPA Target or IPA Actual tier for a sequence of phones and return the sequence along with the aligned phones from the other tier. Deletion and Epenthesis - also available from the Query menu are canned versions the Phones query.
Query different types Segmental Relations found in aligned data between IPA Target and IPA Actual.
Once a query has been completed the results may be reviewed in the application or turned into a report. See the section and the page for demonstrations of using query forms and creating reports.
